yoshida.shapes

Class RegularPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • yoshida.shapes.Shapes
      • yoshida.shapes.RegularPolygon

  • public class RegularPolygon
extends Shapes
    Represents any polygon
    Version:
    9/30/15
    Author:
    Ryan Yoshida

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RegularPolygon()
      Default no arg constructor where default color is black, stroke weight is 1, location is at (0,0), number of sides is 0, circumscribed and inscribed circles are also set to default circle, the array of lines used to draw the polygon has nothing in it.
      RegularPolygon(int sides, float sideLength)
      Creates a new RegularPolygon with the number of sides and the side length given in the parameters and the stroke is set to black with stroke weight 1.
      RegularPolygon(int x, int y, int sides, float sideLength, java.awt.Color stroke, float strokeWeight)
      Creates a new RegularPolygon with the number of sides and the side length given in the parameters and the stroke and the stroke weight is set to the values given in the parameters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Finds the area of the polygon
      double calcPerimeter()
      Finds the perimeter of the polygon

      Finds the angle of each vertex in the polygon
      void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker)
      Draws the polygon on the PApplet
      double getInnerR()
      Finds the radius of the inscribed circle
      int getNumSides()
      Finds the number of sides of the polygon
      double getOuterR()
      Finds the radius of the circumscribed circle
      double getSideLength()

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon()
        Default no arg constructor where default color is black, stroke weight is 1, location is at (0,0), number of sides is 0, circumscribed and inscribed circles are also set to default circle, the array of lines used to draw the polygon has nothing in it.

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon(int sides,
                      float sideLength)
        Creates a new RegularPolygon with the number of sides and the side length given in the parameters and the stroke is set to black with stroke weight 1. The location is set to (0,0).
        Parameters:
        sides - the number of sides in the polygon
        sideLength - the length of each side of the polygon

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon(int x,
                      int y,
                      int sides,
                      float sideLength,
                      java.awt.Color stroke,
                      float strokeWeight)
        Creates a new RegularPolygon with the number of sides and the side length given in the parameters and the stroke and the stroke weight is set to the values given in the parameters. The location is set to (x,y) which are also given in the parameters.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the polygon's center
        y - y-coordinate of the polygon's center
        sides - the number of sides of the polygon
        sideLength - the length of each side of the polygon
        stroke - the color in which to draw the polygon in
        strokeWeight - the thickness of the line drawing the strokeWeight

    • Method Detail

      • calcVertexAngle

        public double calcVertexAngle()
        Finds the angle of each vertex in the polygon
        Returns:
        a double of the vertex in degrees of the angle in the polygon

        public double calcPerimeter()
        Finds the perimeter of the polygon

        Finds the area of the polygon

        public int getNumSides()
        Finds the number of sides of the polygon
        Returns:

      • getSideLength

        public double getSideLength()
        Finds the sideLength of each side of the polygon
        Returns:
        a double of the sideLength of each polygon

        public double getInnerR()
        Finds the radius of the inscribed circle

      • getOuterR

        public double getOuterR()
        Finds the radius of the circumscribed circle
        Returns:

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker)
        Draws the polygon on the PApplet
        Overrides:
        draw in class Shapes
        Parameters:
        marker - the PApplet the polygon is drawn on
        Postcondition
        all PApplet properties i.e. stroke, fill, stroke weight, will be default colors and valuesa excepte text align is set to center in the x and y direction and the font size is 12
